contents.text: Thank you for calling Voxbone in San Francisco, your partner for hyper-local voice and messaging services across 9,000 area codes in over 60 countries.
To learn about our on-demand local numbers and sign up for service, press 1.
For details on our global voice and messaging features, press 1.
Connecting you to a sales specialist for product features. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Quickly sign up for a new on-demand local number and get an overview of its features
I’d like to learn about and sign up for new on-demand local phone numbers in Berlin for my veteran mentorship program.
I want to provision on-demand local numbers via the API and confirm regional availability.
I’d like to sign up for a local San Francisco phone number and learn about international messaging features.
I want to learn about your global voice and messaging offerings and set up an on-demand local number for my physics study group.

contents.text: For pricing, billing, and account setup, press 2.
Connecting you to a billing representative. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Update my billing information and obtain a summary of my recent charges
I need to review pricing and billing details before adding extra numbers to my outreach hotline.
I need a breakdown of usage-based pricing for voice and messaging and to update my billing method.
I need help understanding my latest bill and updating my payment method.
I’d like a detailed breakdown of pricing and billing options for adding a new service number.

contents.text: For technical support or to manage your existing service, press 2.
To speak with technical support about voice or messaging issues, press 1.
Connecting you to technical support. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Resolve a call-quality issue I’m experiencing with my current voice service
I’m having trouble receiving incoming calls on my existing virtual number and need technical support to resolve it.
I’m troubleshooting high latency and dropped packets on my SIP trunks and need technical assistance.
I’m having trouble with call quality—can you help me fix my voice call issues?
I’m experiencing issues with message delivery and need technical support to troubleshoot SMS problems.

contents.text: For account updates, number management, or service modifications, press 2.
Connecting you to an account specialist. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Add an additional area code to my account and adjust my number routing settings
I want to update my account by adding a new US local number and changing my contact information.
I want to add and port DID numbers to my account and adjust call routing rules.
I want to change my existing number settings and update my account contact details.
I need to update my account settings and add another local phone number for my experiment notifications.
